title: Can we make a Family Tree? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: [Music] wondering what is the ruling on designing and then drawing a family tree with names and dates of birth on it and what about displaying it what about the what what about displaying my life so people can see i i cannot understand you uh put it on display okay the display is as understood but what was the other question oh it's about designing and drawing a family tree that has the names and basic breaths on it okay i will answer inshallah in salaam from australia he says what's the ruling on designing and displaying a family tree with names and data of births and maybe date of deaths there's no problem in that insha allah this has nothing to do with religion you can do that without a problem you
